title: I didnt get the victorious morg skin even though I was gold
body: I was gold in S4. Back then I didnt know about the victorious skins. One day I had a game with someone who was using the victorious morg skin. I asked him how he got it and he said it was the gold reward. I was wondering why I didnt get it even though I hit gold in S4. I main morg and id like the skin

replies.body:
Heyo! 

As EndlessSorcerer brought up, there are a couple scenarios that may have caused you to be ineligible for the skin. Do you think you'd fall into either of those categories?

You may have been punished during the season and lost your rewards.

Alternatively, you may have hit Gold after the season officially ended (and before Preseason 5 started), which would mean that you weren't eligible for it.
I believe you can be blocked from receiving ranked rewards if you were punished for negative behavior in that season.
